name: Men's Levis 550
description: Updated original. These jeans have the same quality and craftsmanship as the original 501 style, but with more room in the seat and thigh.

name: Men's Levi's 560 Comfort Fit Jeans
description: Keep tabs on comfort and style ... with these dependable jeans. So classic, you'll want to wear them with everything!

name: Big & Tall Levi's 560 Comfort Fit Jeans
description: Cut with a straight leg and a relaxed fit, the 559 jeans are the reliable choice for laid-back style.
